WorkflowInfo.Name: Conditional Wait with Parallel Branches (EXAMPLE)
WorkflowInfo.Xoml: <SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ParallelActivity x:Name="parallelActivity1" activityLicenseType="1" id="440" name="ParallelActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="ParallelActivity" notes=""> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1" id="{x:Null}" name="SequenceActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="SequenceActivity" description="Executes the activities following this branch" notes=""> <Wait x:Name="waitSeconds_5" activityLicenseType="1" id="333" name="Wait" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Wait" Description="Pauses the Workflow for a specified period of time" isDefault="1" TimeInterval="Seconds" TimeValue="5" TypeName="Wait" label="Wait" description="Pauses the Workflow for a specified period of time" notes="" /> <MemorySet x:Name="setBranchComplete_1" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="branchComplete_1" VariableValue="yes" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> <Terminate x:Name="terminateBranch_1" activityLicenseType="1" id="436" name="Terminate" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" TargetModuleID="0" TargetModuleName="" TerminationReason="Branch 1 complete." TypeName="Terminate" label="Terminate" notes="" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate" Description="Terminates the current branch in the current Workflow, even if it is the only branch" /> </SequenceActivity> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2" id="{x:Null}" name="SequenceActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="SequenceActivity" description="Executes the activities following this branch" notes="" isDefault="True"> <Wait x:Name="waitSeconds_7" activityLicenseType="1" id="333" name="Wait" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Wait" Description="Pauses the Workflow for a specified period of time" isDefault="1" TimeInterval="Seconds" TimeValue="7" TypeName="Wait" label="Wait" description="Pauses the Workflow for a specified period of time" notes="" /> <MemorySet x:Name="setBranchComplete_2" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="branchComplete_2" VariableValue="yes" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> <Terminate x:Name="terminateBranch_2" activityLicenseType="1" id="436" name="Terminate" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" TargetModuleID="0" TargetModuleName="" TerminationReason="Branch 2 complete." TypeName="Terminate" label="Terminate" notes="" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate" Description="Terminates the current branch in the current Workflow, even if it is the only branch" /> </SequenceActivity> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity3" id="{x:Null}" name="SequenceActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True"> <Wait x:Name="waitSeconds_10" activityLicenseType="1" id="333" name="Wait" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Wait" Description="Pauses the Workflow for a specified period of time" isDefault="1" TimeInterval="Seconds" TimeValue="10" TypeName="Wait" label="Wait" description="Pauses the Workflow for a specified period of time" notes="" /> <MemorySet x:Name="setBranchComplete_3" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="branchComplete_3" VariableValue="yes" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> </SequenceActivity> </ParallelActivity> <ConditionalWait x:Name="waitForBranchesToFinish" activityLicenseType="1" id="329" name="ConditionalWait" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Conditional Wait" Description="Puts the Workflow on hold until a specified condition applies" Condition=""%branchComplete_1%" = "yes" AND "%branchComplete_2%" = "yes" AND "%branchComplete_3%" = "yes"" MaxTimeout="False" isDefault="0" TimeInterval="" TimeValue="" TypeName="ConditionalWait" label="Conditional Wait" description="Puts the Workflow on hold until a specified condition applies" notes="" /> <DisplayValue x:Name="displayCompletionMessage" activityLicenseType="1" id="431" name="DisplayValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="DisplayValue" Description="Displays an eyeShare variable value in the active logs" ValueToDisplay="All branches have finished their execution." TypeName="DisplayValue" label="DisplayValue" description="Displays an eyeShare variable value in the active logs" notes="" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Permissions: <NewDataSet><xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata"><xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true"><xs:complexType><xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"><xs:element name="resultSet"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Type" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Number" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Read" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Write" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Run" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Owner" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:choice></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema><resultSet><Type>1</Type><Number>1</Number><Read>true</Read><Write>true</Write><Run>true</Run><Owner>true</Owner></resultSet></NewDataSet>
